mapper.select: select store_id from basic_service_store WHERE station_id = #{id}
mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.address AS "address", a.phone AS "phone", a.employees AS "employees", a.tech_num AS "techNum", a.service_point AS "servicePoint", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.is_useable AS "isUseable", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.user_id AS "user.id", u8.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u8 ON u8.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basic_service_station( id, name, type, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, user_id, phone, employees, tech_num, service_point, org_id, is_useable, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{address}, #{user.id}, #{phone}, #{employees}, #{techNum}, #{servicePoint}, #{orgId}, #{isUseable}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
